scripts.link: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns build android
scripts.test.ios: cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios --emulator
scripts.test.ios.device: cd ../demo && tns platform remove ios && tns test ios
scripts.test.android: cd ../demo && tns platform remove android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-sentry && cd ../demo-ng && npm link nativescript-sentry && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.debug.android: npm i && npm run build && cd ../demo-ng && tns debug android --syncAllFiles
scripts.setup: npm run build && cd ../demo && npm i
scripts.development.setup: npm run setup && npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-sentry && cd ../src
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'
